nodes.text: Ambar's Big Game, Tackle, and Gear Shop

Ambar's Big Game, Tackle, and Gear Shop was a store founded by Drexler Ambar on the moon Neftali. It was the only place on the moon to rent winter gear, either for recreation or survival. The store catered to those looking to rent an ice sailing craft, a turbo-sled, skis, or snow boots. Guide and tracking services, maps for fishing holes, notices of d'oemir bear sightings, and information on mariqar snow q'lk migrations were also available. The store was run by the Ambar family during the Galactic Civil War.
